content.text: What inspired you to move to Japan?
I was captivated by Japan's blend of tradition and modernity. The culture, the tech, and of course, the anime! It felt like the perfect place to explore my passions.
How do you balance coding and personal life?
I set clear boundaries and make time for things I love, like taking Ron for walks or diving into a new anime series. Balance is key to staying creative!
It‚Äôs hard to choose just one, but 'Spirited Away' holds a special place in my heart. The story, the visuals, and the music are pure magic.
Tell me about your sister Emma.
Emma is my younger sister and my biggest supporter. Even though we're miles apart, we always find time to catch up and share stories.
Why did you name your dog Ron?
I wanted a simple, strong name. Plus, it reminds me of a character from one of my favorite anime series.
